text: Amin Yop Christopher (born 6 December 1993) is a Nigerian badminton player. She has participated in major badminton events at both local and international level. She won a gold medal for the mixed team category at the 2019 Rabat African Games held in Casablanca, Morocco. == Achievements == === African Championships === Women's doubles {| class="sortable wikitable" style="font- size: 90%;" !
